thread.section_title: busuu Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of busuu | www.busuu.com
thread.title: lee kwan

author: lee kwan
title: lee kwan
text: I've been learning English with Busuu for three months. Before the beginning, I could only write my name in English. At first, I used it for ten minutes on my way home. Just like a game. And now I'm not afraid of writing and reading in English any more. In my opinion, the best strength of Busuu is the interactive features about my writing. I could be a premium membership forever.
